issue.title: [Java] Rename MapVector to StructVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1815](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1815). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1815?focusedCommentId=16329532) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
I'll start on this and just do the name change of MapVector -> StructVector, and NullableMapVector -> NullableStructVector. 

To be consistent, support classes like NullableMapWriter should be renamed also. Let me know if any objections to this.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1815?focusedCommentId=16365765) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1490
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1490>
